feed.title: Datica Company Blog
feed.subtitle: Thoughts from the team behind Healthcare's trusted cloud

entry.title: If it's possible, we can integrate it
entry.content: There’s much a digital health company needs to know about EHR integrations. Here are 4 essential questions digital health teams should ask their customers.

entry.title: Taming the Torrent of Patient Generated Healthcare Data
entry.content: Our Healthcare Innovators podcast continues with an illuminative interview with Aaron Neinstein, MD on tech that tames the deluge of patient generated data.

entry.title: Facing down the largest breaches of 2017 with Datica's open-source policies
entry.content: As we roll into the end of 2017, it’s worth looking back on how the industry has been doing protecting PHI against the threat of cyber-intrusions.

entry.title: How can technology improve patient care and reduce costs?
entry.content: Our newest publication Rethinking Healthcare Technology includes expansive, useful, and original essays on digital transformation from insightful leaders.

entry.title: Spear Phishing: Hackers Aiming for Healthcare
entry.content: In the 377 healthcare data breaches last year, phishing attacks were among the top data breach causes. Why is healthcare such a target for spear phishing attacks?

entry.title: Announcing Self Service and Free Trials
entry.content: Datica has announced the launch of The Platform 3.0 — Compliant Cloud reimagined including a HIPAA compliant & HITRUST CSF certified free trial.

entry.title: Why There is Up Front Pricing Now
entry.content: Almost 3 years ago, I wrote about why there was no listed Datica pricing on our site. Today, I wrote about why we actually DO now have upfront pricing.

entry.title: Opportunities for Digital Health Vendors in the Pharmaceutical Industry
entry.content: Dr. Naomi Fried shared her ideas on the differences in innovation between pharma and hospitals, and opportunities for digital health vendors in pharma.

entry.title: What does it take to be a 100% HIPAA compliant cloud company?
entry.content: Datica has spent extensive time and money on security and organizational policies and procedures specifically to comply with HIPAA and share with our customers.

entry.title: Saas, Paas, IaaS; What's the Difference?
entry.content: As healthcare increasingly turns to cloud infrastructure, you might want to get to know the different service delivery models — SaaS, PaaS, and IaaS.
